resources.string: It will take at most 1 minute to obtain GPS fix. Besides, GPS may fail to provide time due to weak environmental signal.\n\nAre you sure to use GPS provided time?

To use GPS provided time, you must enable GPS first. It then take at most 1 minute to obtain GPS fix. Besides, GPS may fail to provide time due to weak environmental signal. \n\nAre you sure to enable GPS now and wait for GPS provided time?
Whether to enable agps in different network environment.
Clicking for restore the default settings.
Using AGPS will generate international roaming fees if you selected All networks in AGPS enable option, when your phone is international roaming.
